meanings.definition: A person, plant, or animal that is descended from a particular ancestor.
meanings.sent1: My family tree shows all my ancestors and their descendents.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a special exhibit featuring the descendents of a rare species.
meanings.sent3: The garden was filled with the colorful descendents of the original flowers.
meanings.sent4: The descendents of the ancient oak tree now provide shade for the entire park.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the genetic makeup of the descendents to trace their lineage.

meanings.definition: A thing that is derived from a specified source.
meanings.sent1: The new recipe was a delicious dessert made from the descendents of traditional ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The technology company developed a product that was the descendents of their previous successful designs.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a masterpiece using the descendents of ancient painting techniques.
meanings.sent4: The novel was a modern-day descendents of classic literature, with a unique twist.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer's latest collection was the descendents of vintage styles, updated for today's trends.
